text: beshak khuda ne apane rasool ko sachcha mutaabike vaaqeya khvaab dikhaaya tha ki tum log inshaallaah masjidul haraam mein apane sar mundava kar aur apane thode se baal katarava kar bahut aman va itmenaan se daakhil honge (aur) kisee tarah ka khauph na karoge to jo baat tum nahin jaanate the usako maaloom thee to usane fateh makka se pahale hee bahut jald phateh ata kee
